name: Devwill Too ZX - (ZX Spectrum)
description:
Devwill Too ZX is a Arcade platformer for ZX Spectrum. This is a .tap rom file, so you will need a ZX Spectrum emulator or the real hardware to play this game. I recomend using Espectaculator (paid) or Fuse (free).

The game is based on the Mega Drive/Sega Genesis version (here on my itch too), but it's not the same game, more like a new game based on the characters and world of the GEN version.

Game made with the awesome MPAGD from Jonathan Cauldwell https://jonathan-cauldwell.itch.io/multi-platform-arcade-game-designer

Key Features:

  •  At least 15 minutes of full speedrun gameplay
  •  44 unique screens
  •  Arcade gameplay with metroidvania elements
  •  Combo System for additional Score and Challenge

The download has the following Files:

  •   48k version without music and fancy load screen in English, Spanish, or Portuguese variations
  •   128k version with music and Nice loading Screen

Controls:

  • L = Right
  • J = Left
  • X = Jump
  • Z = Slide (once acquired)
  • X (mid air) = Double jump (once acquired)

Have Fun.
